subject: Re: [junit] How to Test Private Methods Inside a Class
msgSnippet: If you re considering testing a private method, doesn t that tell you something about your design? If a method is private and sufficiently important that you
messageBody:
If you're considering testing a private method, doesn't that tell you
something about your design? If a method is private and sufficiently
important that you want to test it, perhaps the class in question needs
to be refactored in order to improve its testability.
--
Stephen Smith, MEng (Wales).
http://www.stephen-smith.co.uk/
